commit message: Moved around currency buttons; added Hartree's
Added a few extra units; moved hist USD

Changed around how JSON saves work for Units and UnitTypes
- Only Dynamic units will save values
- Results just save the Unit position instead of the entire Unit
Added ability to save customize unit positions

Added ability to toggle between sci notation and reg by hitting equals
- Also fixed some spelling errors in the code
Added hold equals for Engineering scientific notation
Added secondary text to equals button; equals also now flashes when held down
Updated git to ignore *.iml files; also updated TODO
Removed iml files from cache

Modified directory structure -- added unit folder
- Also added currently unused YahooCurrencyXmlParser file to incorporate later
Fixed bug--if last calc had syntax error, next calc crashed app
Added unit values to Unit initializer -- probs need to check still

Got Yahoo XML parser to load in currencies with a bunch of kinks to work out
- BTC is being updated from Async Task - not really acceptable (specially
since it therefore can't toast to tell you it hasn't timed out)
- XML parser has no timeout settings yet
- XML parser doesn't load in update times for currencies yet
Added async update for XML
Put Yahoo XML currency loader into it's own class

Update times from XML now loaded properly; also added (broken) functionally for
displaying 'Updating' in the buttons by moving code from Unit to UnitType

Button refreshes with 'Updating' if 9 is held; if swiped over to unit curr,
updating doesn't show since it instantly gets replaced with new text
Fixed 'Updating' text display; timout now saved in JSON array
Added ability to force update even if time-out not reached
Update for BTC now happens after yahoo XML update; other cleanup too

Merge branch 'YahooCurrency'

Conflicts:
Todo_for_Calc_App.txt
Updated ToDo
Added SI unit suffix display when equals held down; also cleaned some other code
Added functionality to detect extra long button press
Made lots of small edits per Android Studio's warnings/recommendations

Last 3 used currencies appear at top of More list; also fixed some bugs relating
to the changes and use of mUnitDisplayOrder

Added ability to swap EE and percent button; can't figure out how to refresh
button text though--likely broken because of improper overriding of button's
onDraw
Fixed long hold not updating problem

Added long press functionality to ( and )
Still need to animate buttons
Added secondary buttons to ()'s
Increased currency update time; tweaked update message
Updated version numbers
Removed redundant currency unit
Code cleanup

Added support for result preview
- Still needs some animation polish at the very least
A simple decimal '.' will no longer cause syntax error
Long press on equals now sets sets preview to engineering notation mode
Cleaned up todo a bit
Fixed landscape crash from instant result

Fix a bug where keyboard would pop up on Samsung devices
- Still pops up if you do a longClick
Added Samsung pop-up support (with Samsung device, drag from top corner diagonally down)
Added more padding to results/secondary keys
Tweaked colors and margins

Clicking on result preview now is the same as = and long press is copy
- Also fixed a bug with sci notation
